"Are You an Experienced ARKS Op?":
"Oh, <%me>. Thanks for stopping by.
My request this time isn't really a request at all.
I want you to show me how good you are with
a gunslash. I figure you've been on so many missions
you should be pretty good by now. After all, you're
not a loser or a newbie anymore,
so you should be able to handle this one.

*Complete the mission within 20 minutes
on Hard difficulty or above, using gunslashes only."
"アンタがベテランアークス？"

"あっ、<%me>！
わざわざ来てくれたのね、ありがとう！
今回お願いしたい依頼……じゃないっ！
アンタももうずいぶん活動してきたんだし
ガンスラッシュぐらい上手く使えるわよね！
ちょっとその実力、示してみせてよ！
もうへっぽこぴーじゃないんだし
このぐらいヨユーでしょ？

※銃剣系限定、ハード以上、２０分以内クリア"
